definition: practicable/realizable/will work
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
structural particle: used after a verb (or adjective as main verb), linking it to following phrase indicating effect, degree, possibility etc
to have to/must/ought to/to need to
to obtain/to get/to gain/to catch (a disease)/proper/suitable/proud/contented/to allow/to permit/ready/finished
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc

sentences.english: Pablo must have a sound plan or he would not have tried it.
sentences.chinese: 巴勃羅一定有個行得通的方案，否則他不會這麼幹。

sentences.english: You do what works for your child.
sentences.chinese: 你要做對你孩子行得通的事情。

sentences.english: I think your suggestion is avaible.
Mining metals from asteroids seems a bonkers idea. But could it work?
sentences.chinese: 小行星採礦這想法聽似瘋狂，但行得通嗎？

sentences.english: Whether it can work is one question.
sentences.chinese: 這能否行得通是一個問題。

sentences.english: This strategy transfers well to books and furniture.
sentences.chinese: 這個策略在書和傢俱上同樣行得通。

sentences.english: I would like to open a Weifang Mi Fendian Guilin, I do not know if it works?
sentences.chinese: 我想在濰坊開一家桂林米粉店，不知道是否行得通？

sentences.english: I'm asking you. Do you think that would work?
sentences.chinese: 我在問你呢。這招行不行得通？

sentences.english: It is advisable that these regulations be abolished.
sentences.chinese: 消除這些個規則的講法是行得通的。

sentences.english: In this case, some combination of approaches may be possible.
sentences.chinese: 在這種情況下，一些方案組合也許行得通。

sentences.english: So is it correct English to split infinitives?
sentences.chinese: 那麼拆分不定式到底行不行得通呢？

sentences.english: Itworks there and there is great team spirit on those teams.
sentences.chinese: 在那行得通，而且那些團隊也具有偉大的團隊精神。

sentences.english: I assumed a business visa would be required.
sentences.chinese: 我想商務簽證應該可以行得通。

sentences.english: Time changed, the strategy of being bestial a century ago is not easily applicable nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 一百年前行得通的橫蠻現在不容易，時空都不同了。

sentences.english: A local team, Miami FC, said they will try out for it.
sentences.chinese: 當地的邁阿密聯合球隊說，他們將試試看是否行得通。

definition: won't work/will get (you) nowhere
feasible
to be effective (idiom)
feasibility
this road is blocked/fig. This method does not work./Doing this is no good.
(of sb who ostensibly collaborated with the Japanese during the Sino-Japanese war of 1937-1945) to secretly work for the Nationalists or against the Communists
plan of convenience (idiom); stop-gap measure/makeshift stratagem/interim step
to get sth done once and for all
appropriate to any place and any time (idiom); universally applicable/a panacea

definition: efficacious/useful
to take an alternate route (idiom)/to find an alternative/to take a different approach/to blaze a new trail
acceptable/desirable/worth having
method/way/approach
to satisfy rival demands (idiom)/to get the best of both worlds/to have it both ways/to have one's cake and eat it too
to imagine the wildest thing/to indulge in fantasy
lunatic ravings/nonsense/pipe dream
